pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Ottawa, Ontario  

Private meetings.

 10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Executive Chairman of Stelco Inc. Alan Kestenbaum.  

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
